text: Maltby Academy is a secondary school in Maltby, England. It started as Maltby Grammar School in 1931. In 1967 it became Maltby Comprehensive School. In 2010 it became an academy and changed its name to reflect this. Category:Schools in England Category:1931 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Organisations based in South Yorkshire Category:1930s establishments in England
title: Maltby Academy
